website_summaries.verdict: A unique column design with a realistic stone look. Arrives fully assembled.
pros: The raised design puts the fire at a comfortable height
Includes a small amount of lava rocks
A classy design that works well for most patios
Includes a paint pen to fix minor chips
Puts out a reasonable amount of heat
cons: Some customers received damaged columns or found cracks after a season or two

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Firebowl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! We literally took this out of the box- and had it running in about 25 minutes! Its gorgeous-and adds to the ambiance of our porch! We bought the Caribbean blue fire ice- much better than what it comes with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelbell

customer_reviews.title: Fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: I received my fire pits today. Other than fed ex delivering them upside down. Package says fragile but his excuse was it didn’t say this side up. They come fully built, packaged really good, lots of styrofoam. I did what others did. I used some lava rock (included ), then covered in some colorful fire glass. Easy to start, looks great. So far so really good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mitera

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Granted that I have only used it once, but better than I expected. It is built well and looks spectacular with fire glass.
customer_reviews.author: Wiscy14

customer_reviews.title: Buy Two
customer_reviews.text: The look and quality are fantastic. They burn hot or warm, either way they you will love them. I bought 2 for a party we hold every year and because the weather was expected to be cool. We burned both of them in the seating area which had open umbrellas, and the umbrellas never got hot. With the full tank they are heavy, which is good, I went ahead an purchased high quality waterproof covers because the ones that came with it, I don't think are waterproof. I said buy two because the look really good and will balance out a deck or patio with better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this fire bowl. It is beautifully made and designed and fits perfectly for us. So much better than having the lower fire pit. I was concerned about shipping, but the fireball arrived perfectly. Easy set up and it lights right away, contrary to some other reviews. The flame can be soft or up all the way to "roaring"!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shriner

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo Pleased
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I just looooooooove these. I started with one, then bought another, now I'm on my third. They are absolutely beautiful! They also definitely emit heat for those cool nights. Just remember that when igniting you have to turn large knob to the left (pushing it in while turning) AND push other button in (igniter switch) AT THE SAME TIME! Just a super great product. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Required and Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and a can't-be-beat value compared to others I researched. No assembly other than attaching your tank. Very sturdy, stylish with no visible hoses or tanks. The only improvement I may suggest is a "rock" cover over the ignition/controls. The pit is heavy and comes with a thick cover for protection and has held up to a few severe thunderstorms/strong winds. I like that the height of the bowl /flame is taller than some of the other pits because we often have toddlers around. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Check valve connection if having issues
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues in setting it up as if one follows the directions, you are instructed to place propane tank inside body of structure and then attach regulator to the cylinder valve. This does not create a good seal/connection for gas to flow tothe fire pit. Therefore, I was having difficulty igniting the fire pit as gas was not being transmitted; I then disconnected and placed propane tank out side of structure, I then connected again and ensured it was tight, and then placed inside body of structure. It ignited and I had flames glowing! Just keep this in mind if you are having trouble getting the flame going!
customer_reviews.author: David M Woolever

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking - Nice Warming -
customer_reviews.text: A very nice unit that should be much better built. Nice lines but very fragile. I had an incident with the Cover door. It fell while adjusting to the platform we had set for it. It CHIPPED massively! Really? $400.00 and it can't take a "Bump"? It is over priced for a weakly made unit. The "touch" paint pens that were included with the unit were DRY! They were useless..... NOT HAPPY for the Price.... $250.00 would be more fair.... Please potential buyers
customer_reviews.author: saenzcat

customer_reviews.title: Fire In The Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product...as of this writing. Purchased for wife for Christmas and she loved it. Changed the lava rock for Celestial Fire Glass 1/2 Sunstorm Gold and the ambiance changed dramatically. It is heavy, so much that the US Postal Service wouldn't deliver. Shouldn't have to worry about the wind blowing it off the patio. Does go through propane pretty quick if on high. The unit I have can be a little finicky at times with start up but it does work and if the auto start fails, a firestarter will work just as well. Very pleased with the Firebowl up to this point and hope to update after the rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: Just the Facts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our outdoor space
customer_reviews.text: We have a small 10x10 open patio where we put this firepit. The size is perfect. We have 4 chairs around it. It gives the space such warmth. We've had it long enough now that we've used it when it's been hot outside so we used it more just for show, and during the cold months where we enjoyed it not only for the aesthetics, but also for the heat. It doesn't give off an exdessive amount of heat, but definitely enough to enjoy. Very easy to start and easy to change out the propane tank. The tank is very well hidden when in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great flame and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, size and flame. Opted for Blue Fire Glass (20 lbs) in lieu of the provided lava rocks. Thought it was a better look. Not great for heat, unless you are close. It was preassembled, so the only installation was adding the glass/rocks and attaching the propane cylinder. Highly recommend. Bonus - comes with a cover, although not sure if water proof. ?
customer_reviews.author: Tracy F.

customer_reviews.title: Ignition is junk
customer_reviews.text: Ignition is junk. Never worked from First time out of box... major hassle to ship back. Looks great but there is zero customer service Called in a Wednesday at 4 o’clock hold time was “ In Excess of 40 minutes” what a joke no one can wait min of 40 minutes
customer_reviews.author: James Famiglio

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without issue
customer_reviews.text: My unit arrived without any damage. I did use the included touch-up pen to repair a small chip that I caused putting the access door back in place. I suspect it will chip easily. Nice and compact design looks good on our lanai. With the propane tank installed it is really too heavy to pick up and move so I have changed out the adjustable rubber tipped feet for caster wheels so it can be easily rolled into a corner when not in use. I also replace the included lava rock with glass rock which adds to the rich look of the flame. The unit lights with ease and provides a very attractive ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing this item & I was somewhat skeptical regarding some of the reviews stating it was received damaged. Item was well packed & received in perfect condition. Set up was easy & after attaching a propane tank(15 lbs) like is used with a gas grill, it worked perfect the first time I used it. I followed the directions & had no problems with it staying lit or lighting it. It seems well made & the cover that came with it is also nice. I did purchase 20 lbs of 1/2 inch fire glass to use rather than the lava rocks & it looks beautiful when lit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy besser

customer_reviews.title: We Saved over $1400 by buying this Firebowl!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is fantastic! We are debating buying another one for the pool area, as it is so pretty when it is lit. We were looking at a $1,799 fire table for our lanai, which was the smallest we could get and which would have cramped the space a bit, and then we saw this firebowl on Amazon. It is well made, high quality, and gives us the ambiance we wanted for our Florida outdoor space! We are now waiting for aqua blue reflective fire glass to put in it and it will be stunning. Our neighbors have all wanted to know where we got it and want to buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Jan A.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for one of these for awhile now but most looked super cheap or to large. This one is very sturdy and fits wonderfully on our medium patio. Well built and ships packed for a rough ride. Arrived with a hole in the box from shipping but no damages inside. Very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarplum

customer_reviews.title: NO ASSEMBLY!
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY THING YOU HAVE TO DO IS HOOK UP YOUR TANK! THIS THING IS HEAVY, SO GET SOME HELP PLACING IT WHERE YOU WANT IT. I GOT THE AQUA FIREGLASS TO GO WITH IT AND IT IS STUNNING. I PUT THIS ON MY COVERED SCREENED IN BACK PORCH AND IT IS JUST THE PERFECT AMOUNT OF WARMTH FOR ME TO BE ABLE TO ENJOY MY PORCH MORE IN COOL WEATHER.
customer_reviews.author: barbara jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this, its really pretty and fires right up! It gives a really nice ambience at night...it seems really sturdy and well made, i believe it will last quite awhile! We have a big wood burning fire pit on our upper level but this is nice when i am home by myself and all i have to do is push a button to have a fire...
customer_reviews.author: Mary BakerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: An exceptional value for the price and a very attractive pit!
customer_reviews.text: So much to like! First, there is no assembly! It comes complete. All you need to do is to take it out of the well packed box. Then install a 20lb propane cylinder and the AAA battery. Add the rock and turn on. That’s it! It comes with a nice cover and two touch up pins in case you chip or scratch it. I am so impressed! I ordered it Saturday an received it Monday. I don’t do reviews on the first day but was so amazed with this fire pit. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rod Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy at this price point!!
customer_reviews.text: Just here to reiterate what others have previously mentioned. Comes out of the box pre-assembled. I connected the 20lb gas tanks and fired away the ignition with great results. Heat was acceptable in my opinion. I’d recommend purchasing at least two to assure a sufficient amount of heat plus it gives off a great ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: Igniter button does't work
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions and review. Product looks great, seems solid, and once manually lit meets all expectations. I'm disappointed that out of the box the igniter button simply does not work - I followed all trouble shooting, checked wires, new battery, etc. but I could not get it to automatically light up. Contacted manufacturer, and their response will determine my final review for this with updates. Anything less than sending me replacement parts I will return this product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s so nice, I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful fire bowl. Arrived today, it’s fully assembled so unboxing was easy. Added the lava rocks and a propane tank turned it on and poof the look and feel was instantly 5 star worthy. So much so that I bought another. Can’t wait to have both going!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! Added a whole level of ambiance to my outdoor area.
customer_reviews.text: This fire bowl is very pretty and throws off a nice flame with good amount of heat. So easy to use and looks beautful on my deck. Had some initial issues with getting ignigter to light, but once it fired up, has had no issues. Tip: Hold down the large knob until you hear propane escaping, then hit the ignitor.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda N Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful fire pit, very sturdy and the hose is included, I searched all over to find that out. It has a beautiful warm flame. I am using the lava rocks that it came with and it also has a cover to keep it out of the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Massie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: This firebowl is a reliable, beautiful addition to my patio. Super easy to assemble (even had encouraging instructions for connecting the propane. Ha!), very durable. The only thing that would make it better is to have a choice of rocks/glass to purchase. I mixed the lava rocks that it came with, with blue glass rocks that I purchased separately. Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit. Not the largest fire pit but fits perfectly in our space. Came packaged securely and assembly was pouring the rocks into place and installing propane tank. They stress keeping it covered when not in use and include a sturdy cover with your order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is pour in the lava rocks and hook-up propane. Far exceeded my expectations at this price! Easy light with spark igniter. Full bodied robust look, attractive realistic stone look faces. Delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and performance
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to setup and run. It comes with a lava rock, but I instead went glass, which looks a lot nicer and is much cleaner. (Took two boxes)
customer_reviews.author: Ender Lash

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase I’ve made for my outdoor patio area. Very stylish and classy looking fire bowl. No assembly other than connecting your propane tank which only takes a minute. Please keep in mind this for ambiance not heat. Also note you will need 20lbs of fire glass to get the best look. Lava rocks are included but they can’t touch the fire glass in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Material construction is outstanding for faux stone. During the installation of the propane tank, I accidentally pulled one of the ignition wires loose from the switch. I re-routed the wires, twisting them to clean things up. I've used it one evening and the ambiance of the pit is very pleasing and provides a small circle of warmth. I'll probably augment the patio with a pedestal heater if needed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Very Simple Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit was so easy to put together . Basically just the door and propane take . Which is awesome for me because I generally am not good putting stuff together. The set in the picture couch chairs and table was also a set bought on Amazon. The fire pit looks great on my patio. We have made s’more’s every single night since we got it definitely a good purchase. I did take other peoples advice on other reviews to buy the separate blue fire glass. It makes it that much prettier.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit!
customer_reviews.text: This firepit is awesome!! It looks just like real rocks and takes a regular sized propane tank, which is great because they are easy to get. It is completely put together and all you have to do is attach the propane tank. My kids have been making smores on it too! You will love it and I feel it was a great buy! Thanks Bond Manufacturing for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Tower but Could be a Little Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this propane fire tower a lot with a small caveat...It looks nice, is sturdily-built and lights pretty easily, but I wish it gave off a little more warmth. I attribute it to the fact that it is taller than most propane fire pits, but for the BTUs it’s pushing it is surprising that it doesn’t throw out more warmth. Overall it is a 5 star item
customer_reviews.author: Bronik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire table.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire table. It came fully assembled. It is a beautiful addition to my deck and I’m looking forward to using it more in the fall. The instructions say to bring it inside during the winter. I probably won’t. I don’t bring my gas grill inside, I don’t know why this would be different. (fingers crossed)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and effective
customer_reviews.text: This fire bowl looks beautiful and works like a charm. It came packed like a tank and I had it up and running in 10 minutes. I got two of them and they look so great on my patio. They were an instant hit with the family. They give out a lot of heat so we can now sit outdoors for longer and the kids loved them for roasting smores! We had guests who also loved them and they want to buy too. Highly recommended and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Exterior had a small but noticeable chip despite good packaging so it might have happened prior to shipping
customer_reviews.text: Exterior had a small but noticeable chip despite good packaging so it might have happened prior to shipping, but I wasn't going to send it back for that. I glued it back on. Works well; looks great. Flame does get blown around quite a bit in a breeze so you have to be careful. Heat is not evenly distributed because I don't think they gave enough lava rock. But I really like it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Looks and runs great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It was easy to assemble and looks great! We love the look of the rock base. It puts off a fair amount of heat. It doesn’t use much propane—I think we used it about 8 times for at least an hour before it ran out. We love that it doesn’t smoke and sounds so peaceful.
customer_reviews.author: librarianchickie

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Firebowl! I have it on my deck and it was super easy to attach the propane tank and light it up!
customer_reviews.author: MAGS

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It looks beautiful and everything about it is awesome. Yes I would suggest anyone to buy this. You will be very happy too. Trust me everything about this is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: kitty64

customer_reviews.title: Cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its cheep stuff not worth it for that much money!!
customer_reviews.author: Aamir sultan

customer_reviews.title: Double thumbs-up!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fire pit. The fire pit is arrived fully assembled. It’s very sturdy, well made. It puts out a lot of heat. Turning it on requires pushing in regulator knob while pressing the igniter. I love this fire pit! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: nuyawker

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful around the pool at night.
customer_reviews.text: Looks Beautiful around the pool!! Kids also love the fact that they can make s’more‘s . Great Product came already Assembled. Lights up with one click of the button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This fir pit was exactly what I wanted. The size is perfect and it hides the propane tank so there is no wires that people can step on. I purchased 2 of them to put on each side of my pool they look amazing. I also purchased the blue glass flame stones and it looks beautiful. Very pleased 👌🏽😀
customer_reviews.author: ilo

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but both fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought two...beautiful but both fell apart..cracked open and literally cracked into pieces..the bowl..the pillar...i hate that this happened... they looked and performed perfectly but didn't last one season
customer_reviews.author: Quinten R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works great
customer_reviews.text: This Newcastle Propane Firebowl has been a great addition to our deck. We put amber fire glass over the lava rock and it makes for a peaceful, relaxing evening sitting around talking and enjoying the sparkling fire. Husband got it set up quickly with no problems. Love it and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: CassieOleary

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Pit! Just don't use the rocks it come with.
customer_reviews.text: All was good for the first 5, 10, 15 mins. Then all of a sudden the rocks started exploding. Sounds like fireworks! Not sure why? Moisture?
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: stupid paint pens don't work
customer_reviews.text: Would give negative stars if that was an option. Fire bold arrived chipped all over, stupid paint pens don't work.. One leg was missing so it wobbled like crazy. Regulator all messed up.. 2 hours on a 36 hour tank. Seller refused to replace because they are drop shipping from overstock. Look up drop shipping, it's a scam! Price dropped to 195 and they refuse to honor it. Do not trust this seller! Total creeps!
customer_reviews.author: monkygirl

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ LOVE IT ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is absolutely beautiful ! I love it !
customer_reviews.author: brandon chapman

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a littler lower
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product for both ambience and heat took away one star is for the height wish it was a little lower that way when you sit its around or below your level.
customer_reviews.author: Chandan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deck fire!
customer_reviews.text: This is the right proportions and height to sit around, cook marshmallows over and create a warm environment! Every deck needs a fire, this one is great. I know some people have mentioned having trouble keeping the stone looking good, however, we do use the included cover every night and have not had a problem yet. Only bad thing, it is a bit heavy to move once the propane tank in inside for me.
customer_reviews.author: bkirk

customer_reviews.title: Too Pricy and Chips Easily.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. It chips extremely easy. It was pricy so it’s disappointing that it would chip so easily. That explains why it came with crayons to cover the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. Really pretty, nice warmth, and beautiful design. It's a bit higher than many of the other fire pits so the flame and warmth are more at eye level when sitting around. Also the tank fits INSIDE unlike a bunch of other round, low pits. We did get fire glass as well and it's beautiful to watch. I suspect we'll end up using it even after the pandemic allow us to go inside!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Budget fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Plastic plastic plastic. Very cheap looking. Very disappointed in overall quality . Would have sent it back if the wife didn’t completely destroy the box . If your looking for a quality looking fire pit , this one is it for you .
customer_reviews.author: Joshua  Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Must buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It looks great, it's very sturdy and it works great. It includes a cover to protect from the rain. I definitely will buy another one for my girlfriend's house.
customer_reviews.author: Franky

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. It’s so beautiful, I love the very natural look. The quality is amazing, very sturdy and durable. It even came with a cover. It’s super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: melinda wriedt

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this! It’s easy to use, and gives off a good amount of heat. It also came with a cover, which is nice to keep the leaves and things from falling into the lava rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great product! We ordered the blue stone for approximately ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! We ordered the blue stone for approximately $30 to replace the lava rocks. What a difference the blue stone made. We love this product and enjoy sitting by the fire. It produces heat and is so relaxing! We highly recommend this firebowl.
customer_reviews.author: Jannie

customer_reviews.title: This Firepit is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this firepit! I ordered 2 of them for my patio. They look great with the additional glass rocks I ordered separately and mixed with the original lava rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and very easy to set up. The only issue was that the side door kept falling down. We figured out how to adjust it, but it is still not very tight. Overall, I feel it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived property and easy to put the pieces together. It is extremely sturdy and looks so nice! I would definitely recommend and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great for smaller patios
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, no assembly required, high quality and beautiful. Great size for a small space. Quick delivery in good condition. Came with a cover. Does put out heat, but is not strong enough to be the only heat source on a very cold night.
customer_reviews.author: F. Fuerte

customer_reviews.title: Great in-law gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my Mother in law. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyst83

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and get started. We bought glass for it instead of the lava rock and it is perfect for our deck. Just the right height too!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Firepit
customer_reviews.text: The design of this firepit looks so much better than most I've looked at. With the 20 pound tank installed, it doesn't move around easily. With our wind that was a concern. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cabinboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for fall evenings
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, extremely easy to light. Heat is fine if you’re sitting three or 4 feet away. Is fine for chilly fall evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Lovely piece, I didn’t know it would be ceramic. Would have given five stars on assembly if my husband hadn’t needed me to re-read the instructions to him on how to turn it on!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Only used twice so far but flawless so far. Item was very easy to setup, directions wasn’t even needed. Turned our back yard experience into something that was fearful because the ambers from the log fire pit would blow everywhere, to something that was relaxing and very much enjoyable. Only regret is not buying it years ago. I love this pit!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: First shipment arrived badly damaged. From packaging, not shipment. Box was perfect. Replacement the spark igniter did not work. It's a lovely piece, and I like it in my yard but hate that I have to manually ignite.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our deck
customer_reviews.text: Have been very happy with this. Yes, the igniter quit working, but I expected that before I bought it. The one on our grill didn’t last very longer either. Wish the parts supplier would make them better but oh well. Otherwise, this has been perfect for our evenings on our deck. Lighting it with a lighter isn’t a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this fire pit.....
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely wonderful. Very easy to put together, had problem with air in hose but called the tech support and we had it fixed in 5 minutes. Fit perfectly in our Gazeebo giving just enough heat to keep warm! I would HIGHLY recommend this for price and reliability of product and beauty when lit!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E. Rhodes. Linda Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. We love it. We use it as a fire pit/heater in the patio. We use it almost nightly for about an hour each night and the propane lasts for about a month (does not come with a tank).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money with Buy again beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow the best! Awesome quality very sturdy very heavy! We love the flame is beautiful! We weren’t hip on the lava rocks nothing wrong with them I just went out and bought black gold and clear and put instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara j Gazzerro

customer_reviews.title: Makes being at home a little bit easier
customer_reviews.text: Love our Bond Firebowl Column! It is so relaxing to sit outside at night and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gas Control Mechanism Was Defective - Returned for Refund
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective. It would not ignite. The gas control mechanism was defective. I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hobart G. Baker

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE SUPER NICE I LOVE THEM. ONLY THING TO WATCH OUT FOR IS EXPLODING LAVA ROCKS WHEN IT GETS HOT. I RECOMMEND...
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Amazn missed the initial delivery commitment, but the product is good
customer_reviews.text: Product is good as described. The bundled volcano rock is not enough thus I bought navy glass rock as supplemental bedding. Overall this is a good product. Happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Really little to no assembly required. I love this thing. Really awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brenis

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire bowl. It looks really good and is very heavy and sturdy. I put blue glass in it and it's charming. I might by another one and use them as columns in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was even nicer than I expected. I'm really happy with it, it's beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit came fully assembled. I am quite pleased in fact, I might purchase another one. It seems to give off a nice amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this, exactly what I wanted. Easy to set up, easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Annalee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love my fire bowl, and the picture doesn't do it justice. Great addition to my patio, and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Marcelis

customer_reviews.title: we love this item
customer_reviews.text: Although the rock on the sides is much darker than pictured, we love this item. It is perfect for our small patio and we’ve added glass rock which looks pretty. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t go wrong. I actually bought some blue glass to put inside - so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good firebowl
customer_reviews.text: Great fire bowl! It’s our second one. First one finally died after 5 years so we bought another one. Does a great job and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: The bull

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a few times but thing is legit. Looks Great, burns great, assembly was super easy. 10 lbs of the decorative glass is sufficient yet first completely fill the bowl and cover the metal ring - went with 20. Newcastle is the style I bought - matches my deck real well...loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Nice. Bigger that I though. It's beautiful at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, but finicky to light
customer_reviews.text: This looks very nice and does give some warmth. My only complaint is that it is finicky to light. It sometimes takes several tries. That can be frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The device  does not heat beyond 1 foot
customer_reviews.text: The device does not heat beyond 1 foot the flame is weak ,, mistake to buy the facility ,, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: mickey grosman

customer_reviews.title: Bond Manufacturing 63172 Newcastle Propane Firebowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice ouside on cool night. Enjoyable purchase at good price
customer_reviews.author: John Brkich

customer_reviews.title: Great patio gift.
customer_reviews.text: A present for my daughters new patio...works and looks great. Good quality, rain or shine.
customer_reviews.author: Potbelinick

customer_reviews.title: Price perfect
customer_reviews.text: You couldn’t find a better fire pit for the money , looks better in person than in photo . Really sturdy and well made .
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Nice firepit.
customer_reviews.text: Already assembled.....just take it out of the box, add the rock and connect the tank. You will have fire in 5 minutes from the time you open the box! Seems to be well made and it looks very nice on our patio
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mommom Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and use, get a lot of compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit stopped to work one month after we got it
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit stopped to work after 1 month Very hard to ignight

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This firebowl is well made, looks great. I have received many compliments on it and would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My second similar one. I like the round bowl on this one.

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: The fire bowl was perfect for what my wife and I had in mind it fit our lifestyle.We are very happy with it

product_meta.title: Bond Manufacturing 63172 Newcastle Propane Firebowl Column Realistic Look Firepit Heater Lava Rock 40,000 BTU Outdoor Gas Fire Pit 20 lb, Pack of 1, Natural Stone
product_meta.description: Style:NewcastleLight up the night and entertain guests with ease beside the attractive Newcastle 20 lb. Gas Firebowl. Constructed of lightweight and UV resistant Envirostone, this piece will provide years of warmth and beauty to your outdoor living area. Sit by the fire and enjoy the outdoors, as you gaze the evening sky on cool nights. The Newcastle 20 lb. Gas Firebowl will become the main attraction during your social gatherings and family get-togethers.
feature_bullets: Throw the ultimate s’mores party, host an outdoor date-night, tell spooky stories around the flame, or just enjoy a good book beside the inviting Newcastle Firebowl!
40,000 BTU heat output provides warmth and light
Natural lava rock included to cover the stainless steel burner.
Protective cover included to preserve the fire pit's integrity.
Constructed of durable and lightweight Envirostone for outdoor use
Pulse ignition allows easy lighting and extinguishing of the flame
Adjust the flame to your desired size with the convenient control knob
Fueled by an internal 20 lb. propane tank (sold separately)
ProCoat coating system guards your unit against UV light, extreme temperatures & salt to prevent cracking, fading & chipping

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars510 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
